20110125131647.000|20110125131649.000|TR0|is we went back to 2008 levels for pretty

20110125131657.000|20110125131659.000|TR0|$100 billion.  But then from the $100 
20110125131659.000|20110125131702.000|TR0|billion, we did then go look at military 
20110125131702.000|20110125131704.000|TR0|and we looked at various departments that 
20110125131704.000|20110125131706.000|TR0|we thought could be better handled at the

20110125131738.000|20110125131740.000|TR0|Energy.  We said, well, some of this is

20110125132021.000|20110125132023.000|TR0|PAUL:  You can't.  And you have to 
20110125132023.000|20110125132026.000|TR0|immediately do something to the 
20110125132026.000|20110125132028.000|TR0|entitlements.  We left it out of 
20110125132028.000|20110125132030.000|TR0|particular bill, but we do have separate 
20110125132030.000|20110125132033.000|TR0|plans for reforming, particularly Social 
20110125132033.000|20110125132035.000|TR0|Security.  You can fix most of the Social 
20110125132035.000|20110125132038.000|TR0|Security shortfall by raising the age by 
20110125132038.000|20110125132040.000|TR0|one month every year.
20110125132040.000|20110125132043.000|TR0|
20110125132043.000|20110125132045.000|TR0|So, take 36 years to raise the Social 
20110125132045.000|20110125132047.000|TR0|Security age three years -- I think we, as 
20110125132047.000|20110125132050.000|TR0|a society, can handle that.  It fixes most 
20110125132050.000|20110125132052.000|TR0|of the problem.  The bill would be one 
20110125132052.000|20110125132055.000|TR0|page long.  We raise the age by one month 
20110125132055.000|20110125132057.000|TR0|every year.  That's what we did in the 
20110125132057.000|20110125132100.000|TR0|1980s when Ronald Reagan passed Social 
20110125132100.000|20110125132102.000|TR0|Security reform.
20110125132102.000|20110125132104.000|TR0|

20110125132107.000|20110125132109.000|TR0|the problem.  We're all living longer

20110125132131.000|20110125132134.000|TR0|
20110125132134.000|20110125132136.000|TR0|CHETRY:  I think this is interesting.  
20110125132136.000|20110125132138.000|TR0|There's going to be two State of the Union 
20110125132138.000|20110125132141.000|TR0|responses tonight.  One, formal response, 
20110125132141.000|20110125132143.000|TR0|and then, one from Michelle Bachman, a tea

20110125135634.000|20110125135637.000|TR0|about 13, I lost 15 pounds in a total of
